title: Popular Science – Doctors for COVID Ethics
cleaned_text: PDF file is available for download: mRNA vaccines against COVID-19 and their effects on the central nervous system Michael Palmer, MD and Sucharit Bhakdi, MD This document was written to answer three questions posed to us by a lawyer who is challenging COVID-19 vaccine approvals and mandates in his home country. The answers may be of interest to the readers of this website as well. …
